mapper.select: select cntname, (select cnt from vwDashProject where cntpstate = '시작전' and cntname = v.cntname) as "before", (select cnt from vwDashProject where cntpstate = '진행중' and cntname = v.cntname) as "ing", (select cnt from vwDashProject where cntpstate = '완료' and cntname = v.cntname) as "done", (select cnt from vwDashProject where cntpstate = '홀드' and cntname = v.cntname) as "hold", (select cnt from vwDashProject where cntpstate = '진행중단' and cntname = v.cntname) as "stop" from vwDashProject v group by cntname order by cntname

select tname, (select distinct cost from viewDashProjectCost where costdiv = '서버유지' and tname = v.tname) as "server", (select distinct cost from viewDashProjectCost where costdiv = '개발툴' and tname = v.tname) as "tool", (select distinct cost from viewDashProjectCost where costdiv = '기타' and tname = v.tname) as "etc" from viewDashProjectCost v group by tname order by tname

select p.name as "projectname", p.startdate as "pstartdate", p.finishdate as "pfinishdate", p.pcode as "pcode", e.name as "pl", t.name as "team", vi.issucnt as "issuecnt", vo.outputcnt as "outputcnt", ps.state as "pstate", rnd.state as "rnd", p.projectseq as "projectseq" from tblteam t inner join tblEmployee e on t.employeeseq = e.employeeseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = t.projectseq inner join tblrnd rnd on rnd.rndseq = p.rndseq inner join tblrole r on r.roleseq = t.roleseq inner join tblpState ps on ps.pstateseq = p.pstateseq left outer join vdashissue vi on t.name = vi.name left outer join vdashoutput vo on t.name = vo.name where r.role='PL'
select s.state as "state", count(s.state) as "scount" from tblissue i inner join tblistate s on i.istateseq = s.istateseq group by s.state
select TO_CHAR(to_date(pstartdate), 'yyyy/mm') as "pdate", projectstate, count(projectstate) as count from viewdp group by TO_CHAR(to_date(pstartdate), 'yyyy/mm'), projectstate

select cntname, (select cnt from vwDashProject where cntpstate = '시작전' and cntname = v.cntname) as "before", (select cnt from vwDashProject where cntpstate = '진행중' and cntname = v.cntname) as "ing", (select cnt from vwDashProject where cntpstate = '완료' and cntname = v.cntname) as "done", (select cnt from vwDashProject where cntpstate = '홀드' and cntname = v.cntname) as "hold", (select cnt from vwDashProject where cntpstate = '진행중단' and cntname = v.cntname) as "stop" from vwDashProject v where cntname = #{cntname}

select tname, (select distinct cost from viewDashProjectCost where costdiv = '서버유지' and tname = v.tname) as "server", (select distinct cost from viewDashProjectCost where costdiv = '개발툴' and tname = v.tname) as "tool", (select distinct cost from viewDashProjectCost where costdiv = '기타' and tname = v.tname) as "etc" from viewDashProjectCost v where tname = #{cntname} group by tname

select p.name as "projectname", p.startdate as "pstartdate", p.finishdate as "pfinishdate", p.pcode as "pcode", e.name as "pl", t.name as "team", vi.issucnt as "issuecnt", vo.outputcnt as "outputcnt", ps.state as "pstate", rnd.state as "rnd", p.projectseq as "projectseq" from tblteam t inner join tblEmployee e on t.employeeseq = e.employeeseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = t.projectseq inner join tblrnd rnd on rnd.rndseq = p.rndseq inner join tblrole r on r.roleseq = t.roleseq inner join tblpState ps on ps.pstateseq = p.pstateseq left outer join vdashissue vi on t.name = vi.name left outer join vdashoutput vo on t.name = vo.name where r.role='PL' and t.name = #{cntname}

select count(w.name) as "wcount" from tblwork w inner join tblteam t on w.teamseq = t.teamseq right outer join tblemployee e on t.employeeseq = e.employeeseq where e.employeeseq = #{employeeseq} group by e.employeeseq

select count(w.name) as "icount" from tblissue i inner join tblwork w on w.workseq = i.workseq right outer join tblteam t on t.teamseq = w.teamseq right outer join tblemployee e on t.employeeseq = e.employeeseq where e.employeeseq = #{employeeseq} group by e.employeeseq

select count(w.name) as "opcount" from tbloutput op left outer join tblwork w on op.workseq = w.workseq right outer join tblteam t on t.teamseq = w.teamseq right outer join tblemployee e on t.employeeseq = e.employeeseq where e.employeeseq = #{employeeseq} group by e.employeeseq

select count(p.name) as "pcount" from tblproject p inner join tblteam t on t.projectseq = p.projectseq right outer join tblemployee e on t.employeeseq = e.employeeseq where e.employeeseq = #{employeeseq} group by e.employeeseq

select p.name as "eachpname", p.projectseq as "eachpseq" from tblemployee e left outer join tblteam t on e.employeeseq = t.employeeseq left outer join tblproject p on p.projectseq = t.projectseq where e.employeeseq = #{employeeseq}

select w.name as "wname", w.startdate as "wsdate", w.finishdate as "wfdate", p.name as "pname" from tblwork w inner join tblteam t on w.teamseq = t.teamseq inner join tblemployee e on e.employeeseq = t.employeeseq inner join tblproject p on p.projectseq = t.projectseq where e.employeeseq = #{employeeseq}

select p.name as "oppname", w.name as "opwname", op.regdate as "date", op.fileexplain as "opname" from tbloutput op inner join tblwork w on w.workseq = op.workseq inner join tblteam t on t.teamseq = w.teamseq inner join tblproject p on p.projectseq = t.projectseq inner join tblemployee e on e.employeeseq = t.employeeseq where e.employeeseq = #{employeeseq}

select e.employeeseq as ewemployeeseq, ws.state as ewstate, count(ws.state) as ewcnt from tblemployee e left outer join tblteam t on e.employeeseq = t.employeeseq left outer join tblwork w on w.teamseq = t.teamseq left outer join tblwstate ws on ws.wstateseq = w.wstateseq where e.employeeseq = #{employeeseq} group by e.employeeseq, ws.state

select e.employeeseq as iemployeeseq, ist.state as istate, count(ist.state) as icnt from tblemployee e left outer join tblissue i on e.employeeseq = i.employeeseq left outer join tblistate ist on i.istateseq = ist.istateseq where e.employeeseq = #{employeeseq} group by e.employeeseq, ist.state
